mapper.insert: insert into tbl_memberInfo (id, password, name, nickName, gender, sSNum, email, phoneNum, mobileNum, postcode, address, detailAddress, interestSports, auth, grade) values (#{id},#{password},#{name},#{nickName},#{gender},#{sSNum}, #{email},#{phoneNum},#{mobileNum},#{postcode},#{address},#{detailAddress}, #{interestSports},#{auth},#{grade})
mapper.update: update tbl_memberInfo set id=#{id}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, nickName=#{nickName}, gender=#{gender}, sSNum=#{sSNum}, email=#{email}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum}, mobileNum=#{mobileNum}, postcode=#{postcode},address=#{address}, detailAddress=#{detailAddress}, interestSports=#{interestSports}, auth=#{auth}, grade=#{grade}, point=#{point} where mno=#{mno}
